meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>public</kanji> <kanji>residence</kanji> is the one you tell everyone for things like documents and loans and stuff. That means it's your <vocabulary>official residence</vocabulary> and it's in everyone's books.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
